summary: Since October 2023, there have been fights between Israel and a Lebanese group called Hezbollah. This started when Hezbollah attacked Israel in support of Palestinians. Israel fought back with airstrikes and drone attacks. Many people had to leave their homes in Israel and Lebanon. The conflict got worse in September 2024 with big explosions in Lebanon and Israeli bombings. Israel invaded southern Lebanon, aiming to protect its citizens. This is the biggest fight between these groups since 2006.
title: Israel–Hezbollah conflict (2023–present)
